name: Kritika Global
description:
Kritika Global is a hyper-stylized, fast-paced, action brawler game. You work together as a team to aggressively clear compact instanced dungeons quickly and efficiently. The faster you clear the dungeon, the better your loot at the end. This is an amazing game for those who pride themselves on their combat ability. It does not only provides quick action but it also provides all the depth of an MMO game.

Combat in Kritika Global is dynamic and fast-paced. You need to jump, dodge, and utilize combos to beat a variety of creature while employing smart strategies to take the biggest of them down.


Take on the bad guys with oversized blades, alchemical superguns, and dazzling acrobatics. Kritika Global takes style points seriously.


Dungeons designed for quick play sessions propel you into the action, without lengthy world travel. And each one has a super-sized boss you'll just love to beat on! The action is fast, and the enemies are furious.


Brawl with friends or rampage solo through hordes of enemies in a variety of game modes across in a fully realized, immersive arcade brawler!


Kritika Global lets players choose skills and gear best suited to their playstyle. Nearly every piece of gear in Kritika Global can be customized and improved to help you build your ultimate character.
